author: ekoneil
msg: 1) fixup the svn:eol-style property on lots more files from the depot
2) enhance the "clean" from the system-controls build to remove more generated stuff
Test: Controls + NetUI + WSM + system controls pass

author: ekoneil
msg: Fixup the EJB control assembler to use the assembly context's messager object rather than System.err.

author: bago
msg: Fix regression introduced with Javamail 1.4: using bind in remoteDelivery resulted in failing all connections (JAMES-490)
Introduced a functional test as proof: I added it to the SMTPServerTest because it was faster, but this should be considered a RemoteDelivery test.
